snippet.title: Minicology - Date Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Minicology launches on the 25th of April - Wishlist now!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1471700/Minicology/

You have crash-landed into a mini-verse of tiny planets. Welcome to Minicology! Embark on an interstellar survival sandbox journey. Use your crafting, combat, and automation skills to survive the many challenges this mini-verse throws at you.

Stay up to date with Minicology and Iceberg Interactive: 

Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/iceberginteractive

Twitter:
http://twitter.com/Iceberg_Int

Discord: http://discord.gg/iceberginteractive
Discord: https://discord.gg/H76FHQzR
Steam publisher page: http://bit.ly/IcebergOnSteam
